== Kaduppassery (627897) ==

Kaduppassery is a village in the [[Mukundapuram]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 764 hectares and harbouring 2291 households with total population of 8833 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Irinjalakuda]] is at a distance of 8 km. Male population is 4238 and female population is 4595. Scheduled Caste Population is 1519 and Scheduled Tribes population is 5. Census Location Code of the village is 627897<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
